mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT statId, MAX(CASE WHEN stat = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '1' END) AS stat FROM status GROUP BY statId ) s JOIN e_station es ON es.es_statId = s.statId

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT statId, MAX(CASE WHEN stat = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '1' END) AS stat FROM status GROUP BY statId ) s JOIN e_station es ON es.es_statId = s.statId WHERE es_statNm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

SELECT es_statId, es_statNm, es_lat, es_lon, es_gungoo, es_addr, stat, ROUND( ST_Distance_Sphere( POINT(#{es_lon}, #{es_lat}), POINT(es.es_lon, es.es_lat) ) * 0.001 , 1 ) AS distance FROM ( SELECT statId, MAX(CASE WHEN stat = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '1' END) AS stat FROM status GROUP BY statId ) s JOIN e_station es ON es.es_statId = s.statId WHERE ST_Distance_Sphere( POINT(#{es_lon}, #{es_lat}), POINT(es.es_lon, es.es_lat) ) < 500 ORDER BY distance
